甚.definition: excessive; undue; to exceed; to be more than; very; extremely; (dialect) what; whatever (Taiwan pr. [shen2])

甚且.definition: even; going as far as to; so much so that

甚囂塵上.definition: clamor raises the dust (idiom); a tremendous clamor; to raise a tremendous stink

甚平.definition: jinbei, traditional Japanese two-piece clothing worn in the summer

甚微.definition: very small; very little; scant; minimal

甚或.definition: so much so that; to the extent that; even

甚至於.definition: so much (that); even (to the extent that)

甚鉅.definition: (usu. of an adverse effect) immense; considerable; substantial
